help-file.title: POISON
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> | <object> Aggressive: Yes (on victim) Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster for victims, Permanent for objects
Casting "Poison" on a victim will cause them to suffer slight damage every hour and heal more slowly than usual.
NOTE: The spell "Remove Poison" neutralizes the poison, magical or not.
